resources.string: Long tap on the provider to emulate
You need root (superuser) to use this application. It looks like \'su\' is not available on your device.\n\nPlease root your phone and ensure that \'su\' works fine.
MarketAccess is a fork of MarketEnabler 3.0.8 developed by vekexasia and rac.
Changes include no ads, new features and optimized, almost rewritten from scratch code.\n\nhttp://amip.org.ru/wiki/android/MarketAccess

Please note that emulating a provider may affect other applications. In case you\'ll have any issues, disable emulation on boot and enable it manually when you want to buy from Market. Do you still want to emulate on boot?
